column5: Has anyone been to port perry launch? Just wondering if it's under water or usable? They were saying the water level was very low in 2016 maybe it will be a better depth this year?
No idea about the Bog, but Simcoe is up 2 ft still. It all flows down from here.

No idea about the Bog, but Simcoe is up 2 ft still. It all flows down from here.  Scugog is off the main Trent/Severn route.  The water from Scugog into the main Trent/Severn.  But I don't know what the water levels are.

The locks it Lindsay still have water coming over the top of the outlet (beside the actual boat lock) for water levels from Scugog to Sturgeon.  Not a slow flow either so Scugog should be up well above last years level at this time.
I live on the lake and yes the water level is up but all launches are useable  Dan

As myot posted, the lake levels are good. I have not personally been there, but a good buddy has been on the Bog a few times this year out of Port Perry and he said all is good! HE said it is already getting very weedy!
